nodes.bodyText: Any reason not to use the property syntax?
I was also confused about this, but it seems to be a result of AndroidSourceDirectorySet being converted to Kotlin in 4.1.1 of the Android Gradle Plugin. Source.

Can we keep AGP 3.6.2 for now as IntelliJ cannot open projects using 4.1.1 and IntelliJ deals with the multiplatform part better than Android Studio.
I don't think there's any drawback keeping the old version of the AGP. It's mainly a compile-only dependency so it'll be substituted at runtime for the actual version.
Sounds good, I'll revert it back. The main reason why I upgraded it was because the Metalava Gradle plugin was transitively pulling it in anyway, but that's likely an issue on my part.
